name: proagent-security
description: Provectus Security practice plugin for vulnerability scanning, compliance enforcement, secrets management, encryption, audit logging, threat modeling, OWASP Top 10 protection, and Zero Trust architecture.
author: Provectus

skills.name: security-assistant
skills.description: Securing Software & Infrastructure - vulnerability scanning, compliance, secrets management, encryption, audit, threat modeling, OWASP, Zero Trust

agents.name: security-specialist
agents.description: Expert security auditor specializing in DevSecOps, OWASP compliance, threat modeling, Zero Trust architecture, vulnerability assessment, and compliance frameworks (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2, PCI-DSS)

commands.name: proagent-security-hub
commands.description: Security practice hub - overview of capabilities and available operations

commands.name: proagent-security-run
commands.description: Execute security operations: scan-vulnerabilities, audit-secrets, threat-model, compliance-check, encrypt-setup

commands.name: proagent-security-review
commands.description: Review security posture, code security, dependency vulnerabilities, and access controls

hooks.description: Pre-commit secret scanning and dependency vulnerability audit
